definitions.body: in Shephelah, [[שׂוֹכׂה]] Jos 15:35, 1Sa 17:1, 1Sa 17:1 (fr. LXX Sokxwq HPS (after We, cf. Dr) conj. [[שׂכות]]), [[שׂוֹכוֹ]] 2Ch 11:7, 2Ch 28:18, perhaps also [[שׂכׂה]] 1Ki 4:10 (Buhl Benz SS [‘perh.’]; Th Kit sub
); mod. Eš-Šuwēke, SSE. fr. Beth Shemesh, in Wady-es-Sanṭ Rob:BR 1. 494 Buhl:Geogr. 194; Swxw, Sokxwq, etc.
in hill-country, Jos 15:48 (Kt [[שׂוכה]], Qr [[שׂוכוֹ]]), prob. also [[שׂוֹכוֹ]] 1Ch 4:18 (‘son’ of [[חֶבֶר]]); mod. Šuwêke, 4 h. S. of [[חֶבְרֵוֹן]] Rob:BR ii. 16. 21 Buhl:Geogr. 164; Swxw(n).
